featuredCourses.title: Featured Courses
featuredCourses.description: Discover our most popular fitness programs designed by expert trainers

feature1.title: Immersive self-corrections
feature1.description: Live classes, recorded sessions, and on-demand content. Receive expert feedback on your form and technique to prevent injuries and maximize results.

feature2.title: Immersive self-corrections
feature2.description: Expert trainers track your performance and adjust your plan. Personalized training adapts to your progress for optimal results.

feature3.title: Immersive self-corrections
feature3.description: Join our community of dedicated athletes. Share experiences, celebrate wins, and stay motivated together on your fitness journey.

newsletter.title: Get our free newsletter
newsletter.description: We will notify you about news on our site, as well as when new courses appear
newsletter.disclaimer: You can unsubscribe from our emails at any time. You can also familiarize yourself with our privacy policy.

about.title: About us
about.description: ARES - Your fitness journey starts here
about.content: ARES is your premier destination for fitness excellence. We bring together world-class trainers, innovative workout programs, and a supportive community to help you achieve your fitness goals. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with proven training methods to deliver results that transform lives.
